name: Panty Thief!!!
description:
Now available in iOS and Android!
Also playable in Kongregate!Panty Thief!!!
Don't worry. It isn't as racy as it sounds!

Dive into this arcade game and help Boggart nab those designer underwear hanging by the windows! Be quick and don't get caught by the residents-- or from a timely poop-bomb!

Panty Thief is another fledgling product from our internal gamejams, under its first release here on Itch IO!

BEWARE THE RESIDENTS!GRANDMA B

Short for Grandma Bad@ZZ, this tough cookie has had some wild rock n' rollin' times and an ever rockin' lovelife.

CRAZY TYKE

This sadistic boy's area of scientific interest is how much pain his booby traps can cause.

SHOWER BABE

Ophelia the shower babe is always in the shower, 24/7.

PIGEON

Likes to poop, likes to aim.

Attributions
  • Play on Loop: " Funk Break Short"
  • Soundbible: " Squish Fart", "Jab"
  • Noise for Fun: " Lose", "Menu 03", "Micro Jump", "Kid Move", "MenuA"
